content:
Weekend getaways never felt this good. Enjoy a one category upgrade, two welcome drinks, and our host of exclusive amenities: 

* Wi-Fi
* Local calls
* Coffee and tea at the front desk between 6-7 am
* Newspapers
* 2 bottles of water
* Access to fitness center and business center
* Heated rooftop pool and sundeck access (in season)
* Discounts for Flywheel Sports Cutler Salon and Exhale Spa
